Verses.6: For it is only just for God to repay those who oppressed you with oppression,
Verses.7: and give relief to you who are oppressed, and to us as well. This will happen when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with His might angels.
Verses.8: They will punish those who do not know God, and do not obey the gospel of our Lord Jesus.
Verses.9: They will pay for their punishment with eternal destruction, cast away from the presence of the Lord and from the Glory of His power.
Verses.10: When He comes to be glorified in His saints on that day, and to be marveled at among all who have believed. Believing because of our testimony to you.

Changes: 2022-11-29 - Paul Prins: Added verses 6-7, 10 from the Greek.
